content.description: Sit down start on a left undercling and a right pinch, and move up and left through the dihedral on interesting moves that may make you laugh at yourself a little bit. Although certainly not a classic, it is much more fun that it appears at first glance. Starting standing from the large sloper is V0-1.
content.location: Begin far left on the ROYGBIV Boulder in the short dihedral.

content.description: Start sitting with hands compressing on a right hand sloper and left hand pinch. Stand up, make moves to mount the slightly awkward bulge, and climb straight up through the crimp seem to a nice pocket/jug on top of the boulder. This is very interesting and has quality movement.
content.location: It is the middle problem on the ROYGBIV Boulder.

content.description: Over The Rainbow is a very fun compression climb on the overhanging side of the Rainbow Boulder. Start compressing on a left hand sloper and a right hand pinch, make a committing move out right, and make a few left hand movements with a heel or toe hook. Once at the jug on the lip, there is another jug up and right, then you can top out around the right slightly.
content.location: This is on the far right of the ROYGBIV Boulder on the overhang.
